恢复 huīfù recover

指标 zhǐbiāo index

肌纤维 jīxiānwéi muscle fiber
收缩 shōusuō shrink

11 撕裂 sī liè to tear
微小 wéixiǎo small
损伤 sǔnshāng damage
体积 tǐjī volume
补充 bǔchōng Replenish
其中胸部，背部和臀腿 qízhōng xiōngbù, bèibù hé tún tuǐ including chest, back and buttocks
覆盖 fùgài cover
覆盖面 fùgàimiàn cover area
手臂 shǒubì arm
沉迷 chénmí addicted to
21 清晰 qīngxī clear
集中 jízhōng concentrated
精力 jīnglì energy
效率 xiàolǜ efficiency
例外 lìwài exception
属于 shǔyú belong
两侧 liǎng cè both sides
变宽 biàn kuān widen
核心 héxīn core
包含 bāohán Include
31 初级 chūjí primary
驾驭 jiàyù control
耐力强 nàilì qiáng Endurance
潜力 qiánlì potential
慢跑 mànpǎo jogging
马拉松 mǎlāsōng marathon
选手 xuǎnshǒu player
爆 bào burst
粗 cū thick
快便 kuài biàn quick
41 特性 tèxìng characteristic
充分 chōngfèn full
促进 cùjìn Promote
佳 jiā good
负重 fùzhòng load
孤立 gūlì isolated
推举 tuījǔ recommend
俯卧撑 fǔwòchēng push ups
肱三头肌 gōng sān tóu jī Triceps
引体向上 yǐn tǐ xiàngshàng pull up
51 划船 huáchuán boating
阶段 jiēduàn stage
弯举 wān jǔ Curl
肘 zhǒu elbow
自由重量 zìyóu zhòngliàng free weights
器械 qìxiè instrument
轨迹 guǐjī track
推存 tuī cún recommend
范围 fànwéi scope
调整 tiáozhěng Adjustment
61 依赖 yīlài rely
合理 hélǐ Reasonable
摇晃 yáohuàng shake
逐步 zhúbù step by step
循序渐进 xúnxùjiànjìn step by step
66 掌握了 zhǎngwòle Mastered
玩熟练 wán shúliàn play skillfully
零碎 língsuì piecemeal
